maml:description.maml:para: Add a host record on the Infoblox Gridserver
This cmdlet creates a host object on the Infoblox Gridserver.

maml:Description.maml:para: The IPv4 address for the host record. Allows pipeline input.
The hostname for the host record. Allows pipeline input.
The comment text for the host record.
The name of the infoblox appliance. Allows pipeline input.
The credential to authenticate to the grid server with.
Switch to indicate whether to create a DNS record as well. Default is FALSE.
Do not create resource record, just show -WhatIf message.
Confirm action before executing.
The IPv4 address for the host record. Allows pipeline input.
The hostname for the host record. Allows pipeline input.
The comment text for the host record.
The name of the infoblox appliance. Allows pipeline input.
The credential to authenticate to the grid server with.
Switch to indicate whether to create a DNS record as well. Default is FALSE.
Do not create resource record, just show -WhatIf message.
Confirm action before executing.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Create new IP record with address 1.2.3.4 and host name myserver.mydomain.com

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves networks from an Infoblox Gridserver
Specify an attribute to search for, for example hostname and retrieve the object from the Gridserver

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the infoblox appliance.
The credential to authenticate to the grid server with.
The network name to get.
Additional properties to retrieve with the network object.
The name of the infoblox appliance.
The credential to authenticate to the grid server with.
The network name to get.
Additional properties to retrieve with the network object.

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves available IP addresses from an Infoblox Gridserver
Retrieves available IP addresses from an Infoblox Gridserver

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the infoblox appliance.
The reference ID of the network to request from.
The credential to authenticate to the grid server with.
The quantity of available IP addresses to get.
The name of the infoblox appliance.
The reference ID of the network to request from.
The credential to authenticate to the grid server with.
The quantity of available IP addresses to get.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Retrieve the next available IP address on network contained in $ref
Retrieve the next 10 available IP address on network contained in $ref

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves resource records from an Infoblox Gridserver
Specify an attribute to search for, for example hostname and retrieve the object from the Gridserver

maml:Description.maml:para: Specify the type of record, for example host or network.
The field where the RecordValue is. Default is "Name".
The value to search for.
The name of the infoblox appliance.
What properties should be included?
The credential to authenticate to the grid server with.
Includes credentials and gridserver in the object sent down the pipeline so you don't need to add them in the next cmdlet.
Specify the type of record, for example host or network.
The field where the RecordValue is. Default is "Name".
The value to search for.
The name of the infoblox appliance.
What properties should be included?
Includes credentials and gridserver in the object sent down the pipeline so you don't need to add them in the next cmdlet.
The credential to authenticate to the grid server with.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Retrieve the host record object with name MyServer
Retrieve the network object with name 1.0.0.0/8

maml:description.maml:para: Adds a network to an Infoblox Gridserver
Adds a network to an Infoblox Gridserver

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the infoblox appliance.
The credential to authenticate to the grid server with.
The network to create
The description/comment to add

The network to create

maml:description.maml:para: Removes a host record from an Infoblox Gridserver
This cmdlet removes a host object from an Infoblox Gridserver.

maml:Description.maml:para: The object reference for the host record. Allows pipeline input.
The name of the infoblox appliance. Allows pipeline input.
The credential to authenticate to the grid server with.
Do not remove address record, just show -WhatIf message.
Confirm action before executing.
The object reference for the host record. Allows pipeline input.
The name of the infoblox appliance. Allows pipeline input.
The credential to authenticate to the grid server with.
Do not remove address record, just show -WhatIf message.
Confirm action before executing.

maml:description.maml:para: Reservers an available IP from a Infoblox Gridserver
Specify an attribute to search for, for example hostname and retrieve the object from the Gridserver

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the infoblox appliance.
The credential to authenticate to the grid server with.
The network to request an IP from.
The hostname for the host record.
The comment text for the host record.
Switch to indicate whether to create a DNS record as well. Default is FALSE.
Do not request IP address, just show -WhatIf message.
Confirm action before executing.
The name of the infoblox appliance.
The credential to authenticate to the grid server with.
The network to request an IP from.
The hostname for the host record.
The comment text for the host record.
Switch to indicate whether to create a DNS record as well. Default is FALSE.
Do not request IP address, just show -WhatIf message.
Confirm action before executing.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Allocate an IP address from network 1.2.3.0/24 and give it a host name of server01.

maml:description.maml:para: Changes a host record on an Infoblox Gridserver
This cmdlet changes a host object on an Infoblox Gridserver.

maml:Description.maml:para: The object reference for the host record. Allows pipeline input.
The new IPv4 address for the host record.
The new HostName for the host record.
The name of the infoblox appliance. Allows pipeline input.
The credential to authenticate to the grid server with.
Do not update record, just show -WhatIf message.
Confirm action before executing.
The object reference for the host record. Allows pipeline input.
The new IPv4 address for the host record.
The new HostName for the host record.
The name of the infoblox appliance. Allows pipeline input.
The credential to authenticate to the grid server with.
Do not update record, just show -WhatIf message.
Confirm action before executing.
